eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Shasta, CA; AT 09:18 PM ON OCT 15, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:18 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THIS IS A TEST OF THE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM FOR SHASTA COUNTY. IN THE EVENT OF AN ACTUAL EMERGENCY, TUNE TO THIS STATION FOR IMPORTANT INFORMATION.
